mapper.select: select r.startDate AS startDate, r.endDate AS endDate, r.no AS no, r.productNo AS productNo, r.memberNo AS memberNo, m.nickname AS nickname from rental r join member m ON r.memberNo = m.no where r.productNo = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental (productNo, memberNo, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{productNo}, #{memberNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
